snippet.title: Yurukill: The Calumniation Games - Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5) (EU - English)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://yurukill.com/en/

Accused of a crime you didn’t commit, you find yourself in Yurukill Land—a mysterious amusement park filled with life threatening attractions you must survive if you desire freedom. With a twisted story by Homura Kawamoto (Kakegurui) and shoot-‘em-up gameplay by renowned developer G.rev, this is one killer experience you won't want to miss!

Coming Spring 2022 to Nintendo Switch, PS4, and PS5.

#Yurukill #IzanagiGames
